scripts.setup: rm -rf build && mkdir build && touch build/index.js
scripts.concatjs: concat -o build/index.js ./js/vars.js ./js/camp.js ./js/canvas.js ./js/update.js ./js/projectile.js ./js/misc.js ./js/input.js ./js/horse.js ./js/gnome.js ./js/entity.js ./js/coins.js ./js/app.js ./js/init.js && google-closure-compiler-js build/index.js > build/index.min.js --compilationLevel SIMPLE --assumeFunctionWrapper true
